channel.title: Project Quotas on
channel.description: Recent content in Project Quotas on

item.title: View Project Quotas
item.description:
This section describes how to view project quotas.

Prerequisites

  • Application Management for Cluster Federation should have been installed and enabled.

  • You should join a multi-cluster project and have the Federated Project Viewing permission within the project.

Steps

  1. Log in to the KubeSphere web console with a user who has the Federated Project Viewing permission, and access your multi-cluster project.

  2. Click Project Settings > Project Quotas in the left navigation pane.

    The Project Quotas page provides the following resource information:

item.title: Edit Project Quotas
item.description:
This section describes how to edit project quotas.

Prerequisites

  • Application Management for Cluster Federation should have been installed and enabled.

  • You should join a multi-cluster project and have the Federated Project Management permission within the project.

Steps

  1. Log in to the KubeSphere web console with a user who has the Federated Project Management permission, and access your multi-cluster project.

  2. Click Project Settings > Project Quotas in the left navigation pane.

  3. On the Project Quotas page, click Edit Quotas in the top-right corner to enter the quota editing page.

  4. In the Edit Project Quotas dialog, set the resource requests and resource limits.

    Parameter Description

    CPU Requests
